text: The Polaris Flare is a filamentous gas cloud in the Milky Way which is seen in the sky in the region of the constellation Ursa Minor and around the star Polaris. The area on the sky is estimated at 50 square degrees. The range is approximately 500 light years. ==References== Category:Ursa Minor (constellation) Category:Molecular clouds Category:Milky Way
title: Polaris Flare
